title: Blue Koi
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Northern Chinese and Taiwanese food restaurant. Some menu items are marked vegan, and most of the vegetarian options are vegan. Some bubble teas can be made vegan by requesting soymilk. Veg options including tofu with sweet and spicy sauce, veggie dumplings, scallion biscuit, lettuce wraps, eggplant and tofu pockets, sesame balls (vegan) and more. Most dishes available with tofu.
